item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Lol, 1 of your x and y coordinates is quoted out. Quoting out means it basically ignores what the coding has in place for you. For example:

sendMessage("This message will be sent to the player.")
//sendMessage("This message will not be sent to the player.")

The two slashes…//
are “quoting out” the coding aka ignoring whatever the code is.

Better?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Aff Aff
item.description:
@Aff wrote:

[code]if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
PKz();
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
teleportToX = 2441;
teleportToY = 3089;
IsDeadTeleporting = true;
frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
if(keepItem2 != 0)
addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
if(keepItem3 != 0)
addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

	}
	return true;
}*/
public boolean ApplyDead() {
	if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
		actionAmount++;
		actionTimer = 0;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		stillgfx(601, absY, absX);
		IsDeadTimer = true;
                    ApplyDead();
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
                    keepItem1();
                    keepItem2();
                    keepItem3();
                    deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
                    deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
                    deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
		youdied();
                    PKz();
		teleportToX = 2441;
		teleportToY = 3089;
		IsDeadTeleporting = true;
		frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                    playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    refreshSkills();
                    PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                    KillerId = playerId;
                    if(keepItem != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                    if(keepItem2 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                    if(keepItem3 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();

	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

1 set of coordinates is quoted out, so take out the two //'s and make sure all of your death cases have the same x and y coords.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @big_b140 big b140
item.description:
@big_b140 wrote:

ok hold on[br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2007, 11:16:44 AM[/size][hr][code]if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
PKz();
keepItem1();
keepItem2();
keepItem3();
deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
youdied();
//teleportToY = 2441;
//teleportToY = 3089;
//IsDeadTeleporting = true;
//frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
KillerId = playerId;
if(keepItem != 0)
addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
if(keepItem2 != 0)
addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
if(keepItem3 != 0)
addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

	}
	return true;
}*/
public boolean ApplyDead() {
	if (IsDeadTimer == false) {
		actionAmount++;
		actionTimer = 0;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		stillgfx(601, absY, absX);
		IsDeadTimer = true;
                    ApplyDead();
	}
	if (actionTimer == 0 && IsDeadTimer == true) {
                    keepItem1();
                    keepItem2();
                    keepItem3();
                    deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmount);
                    deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAmount2);
                    deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAmount3);
		youdied();
                    PKz();
		teleportToY = 2441;
		teleportToY = 3089;
		IsDeadTeleporting = true;
		frame1(); // Xerozcheez: Resets animation
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                    NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
                    playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
                    refreshSkills();
                    PoisonDelay = 9999999;
                    KillerId = playerId;
                    if(keepItem != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount);
                    if(keepItem2 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2);
                    if(keepItem3 != 0)
                    addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3);

                    resetKeepItem();

	}[/code]
